channel.title: Project Insanity Client Freeze
channel.description: I teleported Inside the desert treasure pyramid, the coords are (3233, 9315) This what i got when the client freezed when i went to that location [code] Map Amount: 1226 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 319 at Stream.method422(Stream.java:237) at ObjectManager.method189(ObjectManager.java:1242) at client.method54(client.java:2947) at client.loadingStages(client.java:2918) at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3317) at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2518) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101) at client.run(client.java:4996) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] Im not sure how to fix this :confused:

item.title: Project Insanity Client Freeze
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

I teleported Inside the desert treasure pyramid, the coords are (3233, 9315)
This what i got when the client freezed when i went to that location

Map Amount: 1226
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 319
        at Stream.method422(Stream.java:237)
        at ObjectManager.method189(ObjectManager.java:1242)
        at client.method54(client.java:2947)
        at client.loadingStages(client.java:2918)
        at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java:3317)
        at client.processGameLoop(client.java:2518)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:101)
        at client.run(client.java:4996)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Im not sure how to fix this

Read full topic
